title: Analog Chronograph Watch Face
summary: Elegant Design. Split Second Stop Watch. Moon Phase. Interactive Watch Face.
description: The design of this classic timepiece was inspired by Patek Philippe's prestigious Split Second Chronograph and is enhanced with even more complications such as a Perpetual Calendar and a Moon Phase indication. It is the very first Android Wear watch face to feature a Split Second Stop Watch, allowing its owner to measure and compare multiple lap times. The timeless simplicity fits any occasion and looks stunning on every wrist watch. A black base color and fine markings ensure a very low power consumption, while also delivering an even richer ambient mode with all the magnificence visible also in standby. People will hardly notice you are wearing a smart device on your wrist.Looks best on Huawei Watch, Moto 360, Tag Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, G Watch R and Urbane.Features:-Split Second Chronograph / Interval Timer Stop Watch -Beautiful Moon Phase indication-Perpetual Calendar, Week Day and Date-Full-featured and energie-efficient ambient mode-Sophisticated classic analog styling based on Patek Philippe watches.Instructions:-Tap on right dial to Start / Stop-Tap on Moon Phase to Reset-Tap on left dial to split second hand for interval time-Minutes are displayed on right dial
descriptionHTML:
The design of this classic timepiece was inspired by Patek Philippe's prestigious Split Second Chronograph and is enhanced with even more complications such as a Perpetual Calendar and a Moon Phase indication. It is the very first Android Wear watch face to feature a Split Second Stop Watch, allowing its owner to measure and compare multiple lap times. The timeless simplicity fits any occasion and looks stunning on every wrist watch. A black base color and fine markings ensure a very low power consumption, while also delivering an even richer ambient mode with all the magnificence visible also in standby. People will hardly notice you are wearing a smart device on your wrist.

Looks best on Huawei Watch, Moto 360, Tag Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, G Watch R and Urbane.

Features:
-Split Second Chronograph / Interval Timer Stop Watch
-Beautiful Moon Phase indication
-Perpetual Calendar, Week Day and Date
-Full-featured and energie-efficient ambient mode
-Sophisticated classic analog styling based on Patek Philippe watches.

Instructions:
-Tap on right dial to Start / Stop
-Tap on Moon Phase to Reset
-Tap on left dial to split second hand for interval time
-Minutes are displayed on right dial
